contest-event.event-date:
June 18, 1892 D Hardraw Scar
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire The contest began at half past eleven in the morning, with a quickstep for brass bands that Besses o’ the’ Barn won easily, West Hartlepool Borough Band being second.
Hampson's book quotes Besses playing Faust. Heroic quickstep. Won £25 first prize £2 for quickstep and Silver Challenge Cup valued at £52.10.00. 2 baznds competed
Jan. 3, 2012, 1:11 p.m. Nov. 13, 2019, 11:37 a.m.
1 Besses o' th' Barn Alexander Owen Faust [Berlioz arr. Owen]
2 Hartlepool Borough Prize Joseph Jackson Joan of Arc [Round]
Withdrawn Kingston Mills Band Unknown
